brushstroke.name: Brushstroke
description: Brushstroke uses your phone's gyroscope and a WebSockets connection to turn it into a remote paintbrush, allowing you to paint on your desktop or laptop screen.

castaway.name: Castaway
description: Discover, subscribe, and listen to podcasts in your browser.
Features a built-from-scratch JavaScript audio player, progress tracking, and a responsive UI.

cookie-counter.name: CookieCounter
description: Inventory, order, and waste tracker for your local restaurant.
Features responsive UI, charts, low-stock alerts, and employee entries by PIN.

odinbook.name: OdinBook
description: Social networking for non-humans. Bless your favorite comments, and smite the worst posts.
Comes with a preloaded login for you to poke around.

tasks.name: Tasks
description: Organize your todos into boards and projects with due dates, priorities, and descriptions.
Your data is stored between sessions.
